YCIO.WindowTitle: Yuuko's Chat Interface Overhaul (GM can override this in settings)

Warning.NoLabeledAvatars: The current speaker has no avatars with labels.

Input.Wait: Tell everyone to wait a moment
Input.QuickRollNoSelection: Please select at least one die.

SwapEnter.Name: ➤ Send with Shift+Enter
SwapEnter.Hint: If checked, messages will only be sent with Shift+Enter. Pressing Enter alone will just add a new line.

NotificationSound.Name: ➤ New Message Notification Sound Path
NotificationSound.Hint:
(GM) The default sound path is modules/yuuko-chat-interface-overhaul/sounds/page.mp3
Leave blank for no sound.
(You can adjust the volume in the FVTT 'Playlists' tab under the 'Interface' option.)

PlayOnOOC.Name: ➤ Play Sound for OOC Tab Messages
PlayOnOOC.Hint: (GM) If checked, new messages in the OOC tab will also trigger the notification sound.

WindowTitle.Name: ➤ Custom Window Title
WindowTitle.Hint: (GM) The title text for the floating chat window.
WindowTitle.Changed: Floating chat window title changed. Please tell your players to refresh the page to apply the latest settings..

HideNativeSidebar.Name: ➤ Hide Native FVTT Chat UI
HideNativeSidebar.Hint: (GM) Includes the native sidebar chat and the pop-up chat bubbles in the bottom right corner.

BackgroundColor.Name: ➤ Floating Chat Window Background Color
BackgroundColor.Hint: Set the background color of (your own) floating chat window.

BackgroundOpacity.Name: ➤ Floating Chat Window Background Opacity
BackgroundOpacity.Hint: Adjust the background opacity of (your own) floating chat window (0 is completely transparent).

MessageOpacity.Name: ➤ Message Box Opacity
MessageOpacity.Hint: Adjust the opacity of the message boxes. Minimum limit is 0.5 to ensure readability.

CleanSender.Name: ➤ Clean Speaker Info
CleanSender.Hint:
(GM) Some systems add extra information to the speaker (e.g., D&D 5e adds avatars and subtitles), which can make the layout of this module less appealing.
Enable this to keep only the native FVTT speaker name.
CleanSender.Changed: Settings changed. Please tell your players to refresh the page to apply the latest settings..

MessageTextColor.Name: ➤ Default Message Text Color
MessageTextColor.Hint: (GM) Overrides the text color inside the floating chat window (including headings), useful for dealing with modules or systems that modify text colors.

EnableCustomMessageBg.Name: ➤ Enable Custom Message Background
EnableCustomMessageBg.Hint: (GM) If checked, removes the original background color or image of messages in the floating chat window, applying the color set in the next option. Useful for systems or modules that alter message background colors or images (like D&D 5e).

CustomMessageBgColor.Name: ➤ Message Background Color
CustomMessageBgColor.Hint: (GM) Customize the background color of messages in the floating chat window (requires the previous option to be checked).

StyleOverride.Changed: Font/Background style settings changed. Please tell your players to refresh the page to apply the latest settings.

UseTokenAvatar.Name: ➤ Use Token Image as Default Avatar (Experimental)
UseTokenAvatar.Hint:
Unchecked: Uses the Actor image.
Checked: Uses the on-scene Token image as the default avatar. May have some mystical issues.

HookArgumentType.Name: ➤ System Compatibility: In-Message Interactive Feature Mode (DOM / jQuery)
HookArgumentType.Hint: (GM) Determines the interactable container type in messages. If you find interactive features within messages (like attacks, rolls, damage, expanding dice, etc.) are unclickable and you get red errors in your browser Console (F12), try toggling this option.

Choices.jQuery: jQuery Object (Compatible with older systems like CoC 7e)
Choices.native: Native DOM Element (For newer architecture systems like D&D 5e)

HookArgumentType.Changed: Settings changed. Please tell your players to refresh the page to apply the latest settings.

HookMode.Name: ➤ Further toggle compatibility modes needed by some systems (Experimental)
HookMode.Hint:
(GM) If the previous option doesn't work, try toggling this one.
In some uniquely structured systems, message interactions might still fail or act unexpectedly (like repeatedly expanding/closing). Try toggling this.
Switching to 'Isolated' may break some third-party modules and cause slight performance loss.
HookMode.Clone: Isolated (suits a few systems with unique or ancient architecture, like SR 5e.)
HookMode.Changed: Settings changed. Please tell your players to refresh the page to apply the latest settings.

Picker.Title: Select Emote
Picker.NoAvatars: No emotes available (please set a label for the avatar you want to use as an emote in the avatar selector).

Exporter.Title: Export Chat Log
Exporter.Description: Please select the channel tabs to export. The export process will convert all images into an embedded format, which might take a few minutes.
Exporter.WarningNoSelection: Please select at least one tab to export.
Exporter.InfoPreparing: Preparing export; image conversion may take some time. Please wait...

Clearer.Title: Clear Chat Log
Clearer.Description: Are you sure you want to clear all chat logs? This action cannot be undone.
Clearer.Notification: All chat logs have been cleared.
